    • toMixedFraction

      public MixedFraction toMixedFraction()
      Converts a Fraction to MixedFraction. Fraction must be an improper fraction for this method to work properly.
      Returns:
      Fraction in mixed number form (n a/b)

    • computeGCD

      private int computeGCD(int num1, int num2)
      Computes for the greatest common divisor of two numbers. This method uses the Euclid's Algorithm and iteration:

      a: first number b: second number c: divisor GCD = a / b = c If c = 0 divisor = second number Else a = b b = c

    • add

      public Fraction add(Fraction addend)
      Adds the Fraction1 addend and Fraction2 addend.
      Parameters:
      addend - Fraction 2
      Returns:
      simplified sum of Fraction 1 and Fraction 2

    • subtract

      public Fraction subtract(Fraction subtrahend)

      Returns:
      simplified difference of Fraction 1 and Fraction 2

      public Fraction multiplyBy(Fraction multiplicand)

      public Fraction divideBy(Fraction dividend)

      Parameters:

      Returns:

    • computeLCM

      private int computeLCM(int num1, int num2)
      Computes the least common multiple of two numerical values.

      a: num1 b: num2 c = a * b

      Parameters:
      num1 - a
      num2 - b
      Returns:
      least common multiple (c)

    • reduce

      public Fraction reduce()
      Reduces the Fraction to its simplest form using its common greatest divisor
      Returns:
      Fraction in its simplest form
